Phone Control Hub

Direct access to settings and home screen

This advanced tool uses multiple techniques to open your device settings and return to home screen.

Note: Some methods may require user interaction or may not work on all browsers.

Device Instructions

iOS
Android
Desktop
  1. Try the "iOS Specific" button first
  2. If that doesn't work, try the "Auto-Detect" button
  3. If nothing happens, manually open Settings from your home screen
  4. Scroll down to find your browser in the app list
  5. Tap to access website permissions and settings
  6. For advanced settings, go to Safari > Advanced > Experimental Features
  1. Try the "Android Specific" button first
  2. If that doesn't work, try the "Auto-Detect" button
  3. Check if a popup appears asking to open settings
  4. If nothing happens, check your browser's permission requests
  5. Alternatively, manually open Settings from your notification shade or app drawer
  6. Go to Apps > [Your Browser] > Permissions to manage settings
  1. While this tool is designed for mobile, you can try the buttons
  2. Most desktop browsers don't allow opening system settings
  3. To access browser settings, use the menu (three dots) in your browser
  4. Look for "Settings" or "Preferences" in the menu
  5. For system settings, use your operating system's control panel or system preferences

Note: This tool uses advanced techniques but may not work on all devices or browsers due to security restrictions.
